text: Innum avarkal mitu nam'mutaiya telivana vacanankal otik kanpikkappattal, kahpirkalutaiya mukankalil veruppai nir arivir; avarkalitam nam vacanankalai otik kattupavarkalai avarkal takkavum murpatuvarkal. "Innum koturamanatai nan unkalukku arivikkattuma? (Atutan naraka) nerup; pu atanai allah kahpirkalukku vakkalikkiran; melum; atu milum itankalilellam mikavum kettatu" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
